mapper.select: SELECT client_id AS clientId, client_name AS clientName, sales_staff_no AS salesStaffNo, is_invalid AS isInvalid, updater_id AS updaterId, updated_at AS updatedAt, creater_id AS createrId, created_at AS createdAt FROM clients ORDER BY created_at
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clients ( client_id, client_name, sales_staff_no, is_invalid, updater_id, updated_at, creater_id, created_at ) VALUES ( #{clientId}, #{clientName}, #{salesStaffNo}, #{isInvalid}, #{updaterId}, #{updatedAt}, #{createrId}, #{createdAt} )
